pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw: I'll look into it tonight as I've also noticed another problem in BLACS. Sometimes when switching between PyQt4 and PYQt5 I can't load BLACS because of some setting saving Qt objects I think but I'm not sure. I wanted to learn more about how BLACS functions anyway :)
